output_simplifier.py¶

Takes ncsmc output (.out) files, grabs info about bound states, and outputs a “.out_simplified” file in the same spot as the original.

Can be run by editing the filename parameter in this file, or just running the file with the command:

python output_simplifier.py -f [filename]

ncsmc_python.output_simplifier.bound_state_line(line)¶

Checks if line is of the form:

Bound state found at E_b=[energy] [unit]
line:

string, a line of a file

ncsmc_python.output_simplifier.get_e(line)¶

assuming bound_state_line(line) == True, return E

line:

string, a line of a file

ncsmc_python.output_simplifier.get_ground_e(line)¶

*edited since ground state energy is not on the line that says “Ground-state E=”

The line looks like:

Lowest eigenenergy= -68.4838 MeV

Get E.

line:

string, a line of a file

ncsmc_python.output_simplifier.get_j_parity(line)¶

assuming j_parity_line(line) == True, return J, parity

line:

string, like “2*J= 6 parity=-1”

ncsmc_python.output_simplifier.get_t(line)¶

assuming t_line(line) == True, return T

line:

string, a line of a file

ncsmc_python.output_simplifier.get_thresh_e(line)¶

line looks like:

Threshold E= -69.0645 MeV
line:

string, a line of a file

ncsmc_python.output_simplifier.groud_e_line(line)¶

Checks if line contains Ground-state E=

line:

string, a line of a file

ncsmc_python.output_simplifier.j_parity_line(line)¶

Checks if line is of the form:

2*J=  6    parity=-1
line:

string, a line of a file

ncsmc_python.output_simplifier.simplify(filename, verbose=False)¶

Makes a simpler version of ncsmc .out files, no more scrolling through 100000 line files!

Steps:

  1. Look for J, parity, T.

    • we may have many of these values before seeing a bound state

    • keep the most recent values before the bound state is mentioned

  2. Get bound state energy

    • there may be multiple bound states with the same J pi T, so don’t stop looping through when we find one

  3. Get details

filename:

string, path to ncsmc “dot out” file

verbose:

boolean, whether or not to print messages

ncsmc_python.output_simplifier.t_line(line)¶

Checks if line is of the form:

2*T= 0
line:

string, a line of a file

ncsmc_python.output_simplifier.thresh_e_line(line)¶

Checks if line contains Threshold E=

line:

string, a line of a file
